issue.title: [C++] Add filter expressions for IN, IS_VALID
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6967](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6967). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement filter expressions for `IN, IS_VALID`

`IN` should be backed in TreeEvaluator by the IsIn kernel. `IS_VALID` should be implementable by wrapping null bitmap into a BooleanArray.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6967?focusedCommentId=16975256) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5836
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5836>
